content: thanks to jimbo september 12 has been declared international crochet day feel free to read the post 1 on his blog and check out his great hand made crochet hooks he makes while you re there a sheared sheep was elected as the official mascot of crochet day so here was my contribution to help get crochet day publicized a naked sheep complete with free pattern 1 http //jimbosfrontporch blogspot com/2007/08/international-crochet-day-its-coming html
